page.title: 10YOUTH HOSTEL,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: Situated one mile from the town{Tyndwr was built about 200 years ago as a home for the{Dicken}family.Opened as a hostel in 1939.It was used as an evacuation centre until 1945.Owned by the Y.H.A.,it is run by the {Warden}and his wife,two full time workers and some part_timers.All ages are welcome and the prices range from {Â£7.40 to Â£8.00}bed,breakfast,evening meals.Self_catering charges are{Â£2.00 to{Â£3.05.}There are 100 rooms including 14 dormitories,3 dining rooms,2 kitchens,games and a disco in the cellar.People come from all over the world to explore the area and study at the{Field Centre}recently opened in the 5 acre grounds.The present warden and his wife said stories of the house being haunted are untrue as far as they know.
